name: ad_cue_points
title: Advertisement Cue Points
summary: Learn how to place advertisements at specific points in your videos

steps.title: Select a Media Entry
steps.description:
Choose a video from your library to add cue points to.

You'll also need to select a uiConf that has cue point tracking enabled. To enable cue point tracking, [visit the KMC](http://kmc.kaltura.com/index.php/kmc/kmc4#studio|universal_studio), click the Monetization ($) tab, and check "Track cue points" under the Vast tab

You can use ```cuePoint.list``` to see what cue points are already attached.

steps.title: Adding a Cue Point
steps.description: Use the form in the [Live Demo](#LiveDemo) window below to add cue points to your video.
